claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.
explanation: The image shows a schematic of Kaiser Permanente Northern California (KPNC) service area facilities of various sizes grouped into Blocks A and B, along with a table illustrating a 4-week schedule in which facilities alternate between SD-IIV4 (standard-dose inactivated influenza vaccine, quadrivalent) and RIV4 (recombinant influenza vaccine, quadrivalent). does not support the claim because the figure only depicts facility randomization and vaccine administration schedules; it contains no information on hemagglutinin (HA) microgram content per strain for Flublok or standard-dose vaccines.

detailed_analysis.image_description: The image shows a schematic of Kaiser Permanente Northern California (KPNC) service area facilities of various sizes grouped into Blocks A and B, along with a table illustrating a 4-week schedule in which facilities alternate between SD-IIV4 (standard-dose inactivated influenza vaccine, quadrivalent) and RIV4 (recombinant influenza vaccine, quadrivalent).
detailed_analysis.reasoning: does not support the claim because the figure only depicts facility randomization and vaccine administration schedules; it contains no information on hemagglutinin (HA) microgram content per strain for Flublok or standard-dose vaccines.
